name: date-fns-example-browserify
description: Example of date-fns usage with Browserify
author: Sasha Koss <koss@nocorp.me>

scripts.build: yarn run build-date-fns && yarn run build-browserify && yarn run build-babili
scripts.build-babili: babili dist/bundle.js --out-file dist/bundle.min.js --minified --no-comments && yarn run stats-size
